insert into sqlintroduction.question_practice_detail(id, device_id, question_id, result) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.deviceId}, #{entity.questionId}, #{entity.result})

insert into sqlintroduction.question_practice_detail(id, device_id, question_id, result) values
(#{entity.id}, #{entity.deviceId}, #{entity.questionId}, #{entity.result})
on duplicate key update id = values(id) , device_id = values(device_id) , question_id = values(question_id) , result = values(result)
